title: I can't play in fullscreen :|
body:
Well.. I had a really bad game and i was really damn toxic. To feel better my dumb mind started pressing buttons on my keyboard and my league client exited fullscreen. So now i were playing in halfscreen, i couldn't control the ''camera view'' in game with my mouse and I couldn't enter fullscreen with the ''fullscreen button'' in the right or make my client bigger at all.

SO i wonder, do someone know which buttons i pressed and how to fix this misery i've put myself into?   {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Sorry to hear the game turned so sour.  :/  You might be able to restore your screen by pressing Alt+Enter.  If that doesn't work, resetting your config will restore your settings to default as well.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

I hope that helps!
Man i have a problem too...i cant play on full screen...i did all that things u said and stll cant play...wtf is going on rito.
I'd like to help!  What exactly happens if you switch to off-screen?  What do you see, or is it crashing with an error message?
